bibl.title: A Monastic Library at Nekloni?
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Discusses the collection of wooden artifacts discovered in Naqlun emphasizing objects that could have been part of the upper-floor reception rooms envisioned as the place where one would except to find the monastery library. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Iwona Zych, A Monastic Library at Nekloni?
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 307-312, 3 figg.

Discusses the collection of wooden artifacts discovered in Naqlun emphasizing objects that could have been part of the upper-floor reception rooms envisioned as the place where one would except to find the monastery library. - Avec résumé en anglais.
